summary: Raul, a Puerto Rican born in New York, meets Maria, a young Puerto Rican woman visiting NY, one night. Struck by love at first sight, he travels to Puerto Rico in search of this beautiful girl.
cast: Lin-Manuel Miranda|Jaime Camil|Dayanara Torres|Monica Steuer|Mayra Matos Pérez|Victor Alicea|Neville Archambault|Davila Belkies|Julitza Berberena|Rose Breedlove|Alexandria Carbone|Iris Chacón|Loren Colon|Omar Cruz Soto|Alfredo De Quesada|Catalina Del Puerto|Ernesto Franco|Czarina Gomez|John Herrera|Bruno Irizarry|Joel Isaac|Juan Manuel Lebrón|Sebastian Martinez|Gretza Merced|Pili Montilla|Wilfred Omar Perez|Milagros Piñero|Julio Ramos Velez|Jonathan Louis Ramos|Luis Raul|Wilfredo Rodriguez|Fernando Rojas|Reema Sampat|Isaac Santiago|Julio Sesarre|Roy Sánchez-Vahamondes|Guillermo Valedon|Marisé Álvarez
keywords: puerto rico|love at first sight|new york|two word title|number in title
title: 200 Cartas
